resources:
AylesburyTourGuide
// pubs White Heart Family-friendly pub with a nostalgic interior and outdoor seating serving familiar comfort classics.
Five Bells Traditional 19th-century lodging with modern rooms, pub grub and real ales, plus free Wi-Fi.
The Bell Country pub conviviality and modern British cooking amongst wood panelling and rustic furniture.
The Rising Sun It\'s a traditional 15th Century, Grade II Listed thatched pub in Ickford Village
The Old Millwright Arms The Old Millwrights Arms is a fantastic local pub serving a great selection of real ales, craft beers and Barrel & Stone stone baked pizzas and Piadinas. Great quality, well kept beer and amazing pizza the perfect combination!
The King\'s Head Restored 15th-century coaching inn owned by the National Trust, with cobbled courtyard and bar.
Horse and Jockey A comfortable local with real ale & traditional pub-food. You\'ll feel right at home at Horse and Jockey, roaring log fire & award-winning cask ales on tap.
History Kids Nature Pubs
Guide to Aylesbury
